name: Hanoian Apartment Fine Stay
address: Mandarin Garden Apartment, Hoang Minh Giam street, Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located in Ðinh Thôn, this air-conditioned apartment features free WiFi, a hot tub and a balcony. Hanoian Apartment Fine Stay features views of the city and is 6 km from Hanoi. Private parking is available on site.

There is a seating area, a dining area and a kitchen as well as a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A flat-screen TV is offered. Other facilities at Hanoian Apartment Fine Stay include an outdoor pool.

The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 23 km from the property.
